About the Company: ADC India Communications Ltd is a leading provider of innovative telecommunication connectivity solutions for communications infrastructures. They have a range of products for public & private networks, wireless systems and Industrial wiring, which include Main Distribution Frames,AccessNET , PremisNET & TrueNET .In the future the company plans to position new products for BSNL and private telecom service providers and is actively engaged in introduction of new products for the domestic and export market to maintain a leadership position..The company also in the business segment of IT-Networking, Telecommunication.
